captions.text: What if I don't avoid my fate?
What if I can't avoid it?
One of you might die

Love comes to me
like spring rain
I'm drenched in the rain

My frozen heart
is being melt in silence
It wakes me up
Sweet, heartwarming, a flutter

I didn't know what it was but
It might be love

Love makes me reborn
as if it's the first time

Keeps on raining
Today and tomorrow

Rain that is like you
It has been raining
Sweet, heartwarming, a crush

You make me feel love
I thank you for that

Love makes me reborn
as if it's the first time

I can smile
Today and tomorrow

I miss you
I try to feel you
When the spring rain was falling
When your scent was everywhere

My love takes a journey
backwards through time

And it rains,
the faithful spring rain
